reviews.title: Quick and easy setup
reviews.review_text: My neighborhood had a rash of car break ins, so I wanted to get a camera setup to keep an eye on my cars. I like this one, it has easy setup, plug in and it just works. I hooked it up to my TV, and it came right up into configuration screen, answered a few questions and it was up and running. Has a screen where you take a picture with your phone and the app installs real easy. I've only hooked up two cameras of the four that came with it, deciding where to put the other 2. Wires are super long so easy to place where you need.

reviews.title: Compact, versatile, and simple to use cctv system!
reviews.review_text: It is a wired connection system which is better for stable connection and with 65 feet of wiring, it was plenty enough to set it up where you want. I also like that the power cord is simpler as you only need one to power all the cameras and one to power the DVR so you don't have too many wires with each camera needing it's own power adapter. It's a lot simpler this way. The installation and setup is pretty simple and straightforward and with the preinstalled 1 TB hard drive you have plenty of space to store saved videos. This system comes with 4 cameras but I like that you have the option to add another 4 more if you want. It's compatible with windows, mac, android and iOS so it works with all my devices. The cameras are compact and lightweight so easy to install and fit anywhere. This is a pretty good value home security system that's easy to use and has lots of options so I recommend this to anyone looking for a home/business security system.

reviews.title: Nice security camera
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for my new condo, and the installation was quite straightforward. The WiFi setup was also very easy to manage. The image quality is exceptionally clear, and the features like zooming, dual lenses, and motion detection are impressive. Overall, this a great priduct!

reviews.title: Easy set up camera
reviews.review_text: Got this TOGUARD security camera system for my laundromat, and it's doing exactly what I needed. Setup was pretty simple—even for someone who doesn't love messing with wires. The picture quality is solid, and it gives me peace of mind knowing I can check the cameras from my phone anytime. Definitely a good investment to keep things safe and customer comfortable

reviews.title: Great camera and the picture is very clear.
reviews.review_text: This security camera is easy to install and use. Can spin and tilt different angle as you want. The video quality is great. Not any the picture quality but also the sound quality is very clear. I can play back the video whenever I want. The camera will switch to night mode automatically when it get dark. It's very convenient.

reviews.title: good zoom capabilities and clear night vision
reviews.review_text: Solid outdoor security camera with good zoom capabilities and clear night vision. The PTZ functions work smoothly, though the app interface could be more user-friendly.
These camera's were very easy to setup, just plug in and go. The fact that they are wired means I don't have to worry about poor Wi-Fi reception or recharging batteries.

reviews.title: just ok system
reviews.review_text: the Camera are cheap not like the first system I got from walmart all so the first system I got has a remote with it this system is not the same brand. this system you have to pay to use the online part of it to watch your home when I was setting up the app it would not setup if I did not enter my credit card. it will work if you want to record and watch at home over all it will work for me as I have the first system that work with the online

reviews.title: only records on 4 of 8 channels
reviews.review_text: This system has been in operation for about a month. the quality of cameras video on the app is terrible. I found out today that it only records on 4 of the 8 channels. Although i can see all 8 cameras on the monitor only 4 record to the hard drive. I have put my 10 year old Cobra system back online, it records all 8 channels and has better picture quality. I am very disappointed in the new system and feel i wasted a lot of money.

reviews.title: Good quality and easy to install
reviews.review_text: I am really excited with this new security camera. It came in with a very good package and all the equipment to install it. After following the instructions, I am able to install it in less than 30 minutes. And it works perfectly.

Amazing quality picture. The security level on these including the app a d everything j can't say loud… is great. Except for I went to plug them in as normal and a pop and electrical blow. Gotta check my warranty on these now…

reviews.title: Good for price
reviews.review_text: came ontime. work better than expected. super easy to set up. just run the wires and plug it in. I did have to get a longer Ethernet cable. disappointed that sound is not included you have to install it separately.

reviews.title: Great cameras.
reviews.review_text: Camera is great! Worth the price. Installation was straight forward.

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Easy to install and use. Most importantly you can connect with your tv or phone. Also, comes with 1TB hard drive

reviews.title: Good looking camera
reviews.review_text: easy to install camera underneath gutter. app was easy to use and set up. picture quality looks good with no complaints. No issues so far.

reviews.title: Good camera
reviews.review_text: This is a quality camera. The picture is clear, it was easy to set up and the price was right. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: MISSING PARTS AND BAD PICTURE QUALITY
reviews.review_text: MISSING PRODUCTS

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Excellent cameras….night vision is awesome…great price
working well, especially happy it included the memory and provides remote access

reviews.title: Great cameras.Good Helper
reviews.review_text: I own a small welding store and bought these cams for property protection. On a slack day, me and a helper set up all 8 cameras in and out fast. Just moments after we finished, the cams clearly caught someone breaking into my vehicle. They have a function that notifies when a human or car is around and allows me to view the footage with marked spots for human or vehicle movements in a 24-hour loop. I really like them so far.

reviews.title: not recomended for remotely use
reviews.review_text: not conected to view remotely throught the aplication provided from manufacture

reviews.title: Nice for the Price
reviews.review_text: I found this stable wired security system, the price is cheaper than most of the 8 cameras, and the 3TB hard drive has been installed in the DVR, the video viewed is very stable and clear. Recommended.
